Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
shiftBoardAbstract base class for individual boards with shiftDevice
shiftBoardDirectAbstract base class for individual boards, without shiftDevice objects
shiftChainClass to represent a daisy chain of boards
shiftDeviceAbstract base class for creating devices such as motors that attach to a board
shiftSixImplementation of shiftBoard for a six channel high current Arduino shield
shiftSixDirectImplementation of shiftBoardDirect for a six channel high current board
shiftSixteenImplementation of shiftBoard for a sixteen channel high current Arduino shield
shiftSixteenDirectImplementation of shiftBoardDirect for a sixteen channel high current Arduino shield
shiftStepMotorImplementation of a 4-phase unipolar stepper motor device
shiftSwitchBlockA block of plain switches
